import "./art_section_home.css"; import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; class ArtSectionHome extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {paintings:[]}; } componentDidMount(){ const paintingData= async ()=>{ const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5001/painting') const json= await response this.setState({paintings:json.data.response}) console.log(this.state.paintings) } paintingData() } render() { const {paintings}=this.state; return (
